document_data.mainbody:
Modern Alchemical Fertilizer Techniques was a book on the topic of alchemy and its use in agriculture, written and published sometime before the mid-14 century DR.
A copy of Modern Alchemical Fertilizer Techniques could be found in the library of the dilapidated Wolovers Keep in the Veilstone Peaks. The fortifications past master was a mage committed to agriculture, whose library was filled with works on the similar topics in the mid-14 century DR.
